title: Tangled
description: A Sweet Upper YA / NA Urban Fantasy If you were forced to choose between trading your life to save a loved one—or staying alive to save the world—which would you choose?With the impending battle closing in, Chloe and her magical family must work with a former rival to fulfill the Prophecy. Yet neither side knows the true Evil their up against, or who might be taken out in the process. But in the moment of truth, Chloe’s compelled to make the most unimaginable decision of her life. Will love of family—or the fate of the world—dictate her defining moment? And more importantly, will she be strong enough to accept the ripple effect caused by her choice?The Epic conclusion of The BirthRight Series.CONTENT RATING: PG-13No sex, passionate kissing, moderate swearing, mild violence
author: Brandi Leigh Hall
